annotations.description: Hello, that is a topic about how to solve this problem. I got this problem a few hours ago and it was a bit annoying but finally I got why it was happening and I want to share this with you to save you time in the future.  First at all, if you don’t know what’s CSS2 it’s mostly used to render HTML elements on your 3D model using Three.js. It’s uses a pararell render that is CSS2 or CSS3 render  An example of both are here:  https://threejs.org/examples/#css2d_label  and this one for CSS3D  https...
annotations.title: How to use OrbitControls with CSS2DRenderer
